comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Original Agence Meurisse photo (Meurisse Cat. No. at right of Bain negative) has caption Compiègne : arrivée des blessés de Vic-sur-Aisne à la gare de Compiègne [Compiègne: arrival of the wounded of Vic-sur-Aisne at Compiègne station] This is a cropped version of Meurisse original gallica.bnf.fr/ark:/12148/btv1b9041876m Pub. Date 1914
